1.15.2.0.5.8:
- Updated Forge to 31.2.0. This apparently also fixed a few other issues we were aware of such as Nightstone Furnaces not losing fuel when an invalid item is on top.
- Fixed stinger eggs spawning on top of miasma (for real this time).
- Disabled the ability to locate well and shadowroot guardtowers since they lock up the game for unknown reasons.

1.12.2.0.3.5:
- Spore bombs don't crash servers anymore
- Patch with Better with Mods that now applies a loot condition to all main fishing pools in the loot table
- Dry bog bug is fixed
- New effect: Pollinated
- When you walk around tendrilweed, you will receive this effect for 5s, which will cause plants from any other biomes in the game (modded or vanilla) to appear around you
- Shadowroot crafting table works with the recipe book
- Dragon's nest only generates by molten craters now
- Flowers from other mods can appear in Midnight through the use of bonemeal (disabled by default in config)
